description: The anti-virus creator faces extradition to the US for allegedly failing to file tax returns.
title: Anti-virus creator John McAfee arrested over tax evasion charges
title_page: Anti-virus creator John McAfee arrested over tax evasion charges - BBC News
maintext: The SEC is seeking to impose a civil penalty on him, and disgorge him of any "allegedly ill-gotten gains", with interest. It also wants to permanently ban him from serving as an officer or director of any listed company, or any company which files reports to the SEC.
